name: Boys Best Friend Baby Bib
description:
Classic yet one of a kind Bib for your baby dribbles. Protects clothing allowing Baby to stay fresh! Babiease Bibs are very absorbent and Soak-Proof - tested by my drooling son! Three layer construction; backing made of soft white flannel, doubled for super absorbency, topped with quality cotton.

READY TO SHIP!! Like most if not all of Babiease bibs!

Neck closure- embellished with a snap which are CPSIA (Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act) compliant

Measures approx. 8 x 10.5 inches

Designer Fabric:
Robert Kaufman and Laurie Wisbrun, Pooches and Pickups

Machine Wash Warm.
Tumble Dry Low
Warm Iron, if needed

All items made with love in a smoke and pet-free environment.

Follow Babiease!!
FACEBOOK http://on.fb.me/cjgiaB
TWITTER http://twitter.com/#!/Babiease
